title: Auto-open last session when reopening project
description: When opening a project with no explicit session selected, reuse the most recent session instead of creating a brand-new one. Find where sessions are picked (Sidebar/App) and prefer latest discoverSessions result.
notes: Implemented OpenCode session discovery by reading opencode.db from data directory (defaults to .opencode or data.directory from .opencode.json in project/XDG/home). Discovery now accepts backend and returns latest sessions for OpenCode based on updated_at/message_count; renderer uses backend to pick latest session on load/open.

comments.author: user
comments.text: Added session fallback in App handleOpenSession to reuse most recent session unless forceNewSession is set.

title: Investigate opencode backend not used for new sessions
description: Investigate why project backend set to opencode still opens Claude Code for new sessions. Gather config location, app, repro steps.
notes: Found OpenCode CLI exits immediately because PTY passes unsupported flag --allowedTools when autoAcceptTools are set. Removing OpenCode permission args avoids immediate exit (code 1).

comments.author: user
comments.text: Found settings in ~/.config/simple-code-gui/config/workspace.json show backend opencode. New sessions still defaulted because App settings state only set on initial load; saving in SettingsModal doesn't update App.settings, so handleOpenSession still uses stale backend. Added SettingsModal onSaved callback to refresh App state after save.
